text: The Posts and Telecommunications Division () is a government department in Bangladesh. It is part of the Ministry of Posts, Telecommunications, and Information Technology. This department is located in Dhaka, Bangladesh. == Constituent organizations == List of the organizations and agencies under the division: * Bangladesh Telecommunication Regulatory Commission * Bangladesh Post Office * Bangladesh Telecommunications Company Limited * Bangladesh Submarine Cable Company Limited * Teletalk Bangladesh Ltd * Telephone Shilpa Sangstha * Bangladesh Cable Shilpa Limited * Department of Telecommunications * Mailing operator and courier services licensing authority * Bangladesh Satellite Company Limited == References == Category:Government agencies of Bangladesh Category:Telecommunications in Bangladesh Category:Organisations based in Dhaka Category:Postal system of Bangladesh
title: Posts and Telecommunications Division
